backend/main.mo: Implements access control, user approval, and user profile storage with admin-restricted role and approval management.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries linking build and documentation updates to component versions and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files used in the Word Hunt game and build process.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Documentation covering prerequisites and steps to build debug and release Android APKs using TWA or Capacitor.
frontend/android-apk-output/.gitignore: Ignores APKs, AABs, logs, and temporary build files in the output directory.
frontend/android-apk-output/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file ensuring the output directory is tracked by Git.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Android-specific gitignore rules covering build outputs, temp files, IDE files, keystores, and Capacitor assets.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle config for the Android app, defining SDK versions, build types, Java 17 compatibility, and Capacitor dependencies.
frontend/android/app/capacitor.build.gra: Generated Capacitor build file enforcing Java 17 and applying Cordova plugin variables.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard configuration preserving all classes under com.wordhunt.game.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Manifest defining app metadata, main activity, FileProvider, and required permissions.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/w: Main Capacitor BridgeActivity entry point for the Android application.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen layout combining a background color and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resource definitions for primary, dark, and accent theme colors.
String resources containing app name, activity title, package name, and URL scheme.
Defines base and no-action-bar themes plus a launch splash theme.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: FileProvider path configuration allowing access to cache, external files, and external storage.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting repositories, buildscript dependencies, and a clean task.
frontend/android/capacitor-cordova-andro: Build config for Capacitor Cordova plugin bundle with Java 17 and standard Android library settings.
Generated variables file defining Cordova-related SDK and version settings.
frontend/android/capacitor.settings.grad: Generated settings file including Capacitor modules and linking them to node_modules paths.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Defines Gradle and Android build settings including JVM args, AndroidX flags, Flipper version, ABI filters, and Hermes engine toggle.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures the Gradle wrapper distribution, pointing to Gradle 8.4.
frontend/android/gradlew: POSIX shell script that launches the Gradle wrapper for building the Android project.
frontend/android/gradlew.bat: Windows batch script for executing the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Includes app modules and applies Capacitor Android settings.
frontend/android/variables.gradle: Defines Android SDK versions and library dependency versions used in the build.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor config defining app metadata, web directory, Android scheme, and build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup plus theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including PWA manifest, icons, metadata, and bootstrapping the app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app name, icons, theme, display mode, and categories.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk.sh: Shell script automating web build and Android APK generation for debug or release.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the WordHuntScreen inside a styled container.
frontend/src/components/game/GameControl: React component providing UI for progress display, timer, and timeâ€‘limit settings.
Renders the interactive letter grid, handling pointer-based selection and highlighting found or selected cells.
frontend/src/components/game/WordHuntScr: Provides the main Word Hunt UI with header, controls, timer handling, puzzle grid, and word list.
frontend/src/components/game/WordList.ts: Displays the word list, sorting and styling words based on whether they are found.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login, stored identity restoration, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useWordHuntGame.ts: Implements game state, puzzle generation, timer logic, and word selection validation for Word Hunt.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/duration.ts: Provides utilities for converting, validating, and clamping countdown timer durations.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/generator.ts: Generates a word-hunt puzzle by placing shuffled words onto a grid and filling remaining cells with random letters.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/selection.ts: Handles determining selected cells in a straight line and validating whether the selected letters form a valid word.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/time.ts: Provides a utility to format seconds into MM:SS time strings.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/words.ts: Exports the full automotive-themed word list used for puzzle generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using ReactDOM with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including version, architectural notes, features, and build status.
